titleStmt.title: Charles Nettleton to Thomas E. Bramlette
CWG2060

availability.p: This image and transcription is publicly accessible. The image appears courtesy of the repository named in the Source Description. The transcription and annotation were undertaken by Kentucky Historical Society staff, volunteers, and interns. If referencing this document title, accession number, and permanent URL.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

msIdentifier.repository: Kentucky Department for Libraries and Archives
msIdentifier.collection: Office of the Governor, Thomas E. Bramlette: Appointments by the Governor, Civil Appointments, 1863-1867

creation.placeName: New York, New York County, New York

body.p:
BACK PAY, BOUNTY AND PENSION OFFICE,
NETTLETON, GILBERT & CAMP,
Attorneys and Counsellors at Law,
No. 111 BROADWAY.

CHARLES NETTLETON,
Notary and Commissioner for all the States,
EDWARD GILBERT,
HENRY CAMP,

New York, March 11th 1865
Hon Thomas E Bramlette
Gov. of Ky. Frankfort Ky.
Sir- My appointment as Commissioner for your State to reside in this City, will expire early next month.
I would respectfully ask you for a renewal of the appointment --

I am with much Respect
Truly Yours
Charles Nettleton

Comr Deeds
New York
Chas Nettleton
apptd 15th Mch/65
